thread.title: More Pollution Than Cars? Gas-Powered Gardening Equipment Poses the Next Air-Quality Threat
thread.title_full: More Pollution Than Cars? Gas-Powered Gardening Equipment Poses the Next Air-Quality Threat

author: KQED Science
title: More Pollution Than Cars? Gas-Powered Gardening Equipment Poses the Next Air-Quality Threat
text:
They may look pretty innocuous — those leaf blowers, hedge trimmers and gas mowers wielded by a small army of gardening crews across the state.
They’re not.
According to state air quality officials, those machines are some of the biggest polluters in California. In fact, by 2020, leaf blowers and other small Read More …
